summary: In Paris, a Polish gigolo marries a rich Jewish doctor and stands to inherit her estate when she is deported to Dachau by the Nazis.

Brunius|Jean Marc|Andre Charisse|Danièle Noël|Arnold Diamond|Franco De Rosa|Doreen Moore|Harriet Harper|Yvonne Andre|Henri Vidon|Pamela Stirling|Eugene Keeley|Jean Driant|Mischa De La Motte|Rica Fox|Viviane Ventura|John Serret|Vernon Dobtcheff|André Maranne|Robert Rietty
keywords: murder of a nude woman|murder by drowning|man kisses woman's foot|murder|chess
title: Una llamada a las doce
